text: 18:20 Godɨn Araziba 24:16; Aisaia 3:10-11; Esekiel 18:4; Rom 2:9Gumazim an arazir kuram gami, anarɨram aremegham. Otarim afeziamɨn arazir kurabar ivezir kuram inian kogham. Eghtɨ afeziam, otarimɨn arazir kurabar ivezir kuram inian kogham. Gumazir arazir aghuim gamizim, an an ivezir aghuim iniam. Eghtɨ gumazir arazir kurabagh amim, a da bangɨn ivezir kuram iniam.
